verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
The body was broken,
and the blood it was shed
And my Savior won the victory
from the dead

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As we come to the table,
we give thanks
on bended knee,
Lord, that you can love sinners
such as we

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise be to Thee,
Lord Jesus
Praise be to Thee,
Lord, that you can love sinners
such as we
(repeat)
